description: Sucks up nutrients to Drain half the damage dealt.
name: Absorb

description: Priority. Smashes at the speed of a landslide.
name: Accelerock

description: On 18+, Drops SDEF by -5. A spray of corrosive fluid.
name: Acid

description: Boosts DEF by +10, liquifying the user and breaking down their molecular bonds.
name: Acid Armor

description: Melts with a splattering acidic bomb to Drop SDEF by -10.
name: Acid Spray

description: A nimble aerial strike. If the user holds no items, Acrobatics does +7 damage.
name: Acrobatics

range: Self or Contact - Ally in Zone
description:
Bypasses Protection. Sharply presses stress points to unblock natural energy. Roll d6:

  1. Boost ATK by +10
  2. Boost DEF by +10
  3. Boost SATK by +10
  4. Boost SDEF by +10
  5. Boost SPE by +10
  6. Boost Accuracy Rate by +2
zEffect: Boost the user's Critical Rate by +2.
name: Acupressure

description: Slices twice so precise to cut the air like a swallowtail in flight.
name: Aerial Ace

description: Critical Hit on 15+. A terrible typhoon tears at the target.
name: Aeroblast

description: If the target hasn’t acted yet this round, they take their turn right after the user.
name: After You

description: Relaxes and loosens the body to Boost SPE by +10.
name: Agility

description: Critical Hit on 18+. A razorlike gale hacks at the target. If there’s only one target, Air Cutter does +3 damage.
name: Air Cutter

description: Flinches on 15+. A sky-slicing blade of air.
name: Air Slash

description: Super-Priority. Choose an ally within 2 Zones and switch them with the user. Moves targeting either now target their replacements.
name: Ally Switch

description: Empties the mind to heighten awareness and Boost SDEF by +10.

description: Clobbers and entangles with a chained anchor. The target is Trapped while the user is in battle.

description: On 19+, prehistoric force suffuses the user to Boost all their Stats by +5 each. (Even if it misses.)

description: Drops the target’s SDEF by -5. Undiluted apple juice that tastes even sourer than you’d think.
name: Apple Acid

description: Critical Hit on 18+. Expels pressurized water to slice like a blade.
name: Aqua Cutter

description: Priority. Spouts pressurized water to hydroplane into the target.
name: Aqua Jet

description: A revitalizing pure water bath. The user Heals a Tick between rounds until it leaves battle.

description: Toys with the target with a fluid dance that Boosts the user’s SPE by +5.

description: A staggering blow like the crash of a tsunami.
name: Aqua Tail

description: Multi-strike. A staccato of straight-arm slaps.
name: Arm Thrust

description: Shoots the user’s own armor as blazing projectiles, Dropping the user’s DEF and SDEF by -5 each.
name: Armor Cannon

description: A soothing herbal scent cures all Status Problems from the user, its team members, and allies in Zone.

description: Bypasses Protection. A mysterious scent Boosts SDEF by +5.
name: Aromatic Mist

description: The user needs any help it can get. Randomly pick one of the user’s teammates, then use a random Move that teammate knows.
zEffect: The used Move turns into its corresponding Z-Move.
name: Assist

description: Kick ‘em while they’re down. If the target already lost some HP this round, Assurance does +12 damage.
name: Assurance

description: Flinches on 15+. Strikes with a startling shout.
name: Astonish

description: Sends an army of ghosts to attack the living. If there is only one target, Astral Barrage does +10 damage.
name: Astral Barrage

description: Critical Hit on 18+. Pummels with buggish soldiers.

description: Weaponizes love to Infatuate a compatible target.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Attract

description: A spirit bomb of life energy.
name: Aura Sphere

description: Becomes Dark-Type if the user is in Hangry Form. A spunout energy treadwheel.
name: Aura Wheel

description: On 18+, Drops the target’s ATK by -5. A ray of iridescent northern light.

description: Only usable in a snowstorm. Moves targeting affected allies get -1 Effectiveness for 5 rounds. Aurora Veil lasts 1 round less for each ally (including the user) you choose to target when using it.
name: Aurora Veil

description: Sheds spare parts to Boost SPE by +10. Lose 220 lbs for the rest of the battle. (Minimum 0.2 lbs.)

description: Delayed. Brings down a mountain’s snowfall. If a Move damaged the user this round, Avalanche does +6 damage.
name: Avalanche

description: Confuses on 16+. If Axe Kick misses, the user loses 5 Ticks. Lifts a leg and slams the heel down.
name: Axe Kick

description: Priority. Sweet, innocent eyes Drop ATK by -5.
name: Baby-Doll Eyes

description: Sets Reflect. (Physical Moves targeting yourself and affected allies get -1 Effectiveness for 5 rounds. Reflect lasts 1 round less for each ally (except the user) you choose to target when using it.) Bad behavior gets rewarded.
name: Baddy Bad

description: Super-Priority. A poison palisade protects until the next round. Attackers that make contact are Poisoned.
name: Baneful Bunker

description: Poisons on 15+. Gets +6 Power against targets with Persistent Status conditions. Toxic barb bombardment.
name: Barb Barrage

description: Multi-strike. Pelts the target with spheres. Or eggs.

description: A wall of psychic energy Boosts DEF by +10.
name: Barrier

description: The user tags in a teammate and switches out, even if the user is Trapped. All Boosted/Dropped Stats and ongoing effects transfer to the replacement. Choose the replacement when choosing the Move.

description: Priority. Allies other than the user lower their Moves’ PP costs by -2 for this round.
zEffect: Boost the user's Save Bonus by +3.

description: Priority. Heats up a beak at the start of the round, then explodes at the end. Attackers making contact while heating up are Burned.
name: Beak Blast

description: “Multi-Strike”. Add the ATK of either every ally in Zone or every team member without status problems to the damage. The target subtracts their DEF from damage for every ally/teammate used. Hit them with the power of friendship.

description: A true shield stops the power of giants. Gets +1 Effectiveness if the target is Dynamaxed.
name: Behemoth Bash

description: A true blade cuts down titanic foes. Gets +1 Effectiveness if the target is Dynamaxed.
name: Behemoth Blade

description: A rude release of gas. Only usable if the user ate an Item this encounter.
name: Belch

description: Beats chest to Boost ATK by +20 and lose 50% of maximum HP. (Fails at ≤50% HP.)

description: Bypasses Protection. A thoughtful gift of the user’s held item, unless the target doesn’t have room to hold it.
name: Bestow

description: This round: Priority. The user perserveres, storing hardship. Next round: The target loses twice the HP that the user lost while Biding.
name: Bide

description: Binds and Traps the target for 3 rounds with the user’s body, dealing 2 Ticks of HP Loss between rounds.

description: Flinches on 15+. An underhanded fangly chomp.
name: Bite

description: Focuses bitterness toward the living into a slash that Drains half the damage dealt.
name: Bitter Blade

description: Frostbite on 15+. Gets +6 Power against targets with Persistent Status conditions. Attacks with spine-chilling resentment.

description: Exhausting. A towering blaze of explosive fire.
name: Blast Burn

description: Burns on 19+ and is a Critical Hit on 18+. A knee strike burning with determination.
name: Blaze Kick

description: Burns on 16+. A dragster burnout accelerates into the target.

description: On 15+, Drops SPE by -5. Summons a bonechilling squall that makes body and spirit tremble.

description: Freezes on 19+. Can’t miss in a snowstorm. A howling nor’easter slices with subzero shards. If there’s only one target, Blizzard does +8 damage.
name: Blizzard

description: Bypasses Protection. Cuts off the target’s escape, Trapping it until the user leaves or faints.
name: Block

description: Burns on 17+. Engulfs with a brilliant blue flame.

description: Bolt Beak does +11 damage if attacking a target that hasn’t moved yet this Round. A lightning blast that only increases over time.
name: Bolt Beak

description: Paralyzes on 17+. A tackle swathed with a supercharged field.
name: Bolt Strike

description: Flinches on 18+. A morbid blow.
name: Bone Club

description: Multi-strike. A barrage of skeleton bits.
name: Bone Rush

description: Double Strike. Desecrates the dead and the target’s face coming and going.

description: Sonic. The worst noise, at 150 decibels. If there is only one target, Boomburst does +11 damage.
name: Boomburst

description:
This turn: the user leaps high into the air.
Next turn: collides with the target, Paralyzing on 16+.
name: Bounce

description: Absorbing bubbles Drain half the damage dealt. One mon’s bubble is another mon’s trouble.
name: Bouncy Bubble

description: Hits ‘em with a stick.
name: Branch Poke

description: Recoil ⅓. A risky skydive you’d be birdbrained to try.
name: Brave Bird

description: Drops the ATK of damaged targets by -5. A swing that brings down all attackers. If there’s only one target, Breaking Swipe does +3 damage.

description: Before successfully inflicting damage, destroy the target party’s Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil. A board-breaking blow that can bust bricks.
name: Brick Break

description: If the target is below 50% HP, Brine does +10 damage. Saltwater stings wounds.
name: Brine

description: A violent tantrum that damages everything in reach. If there is only one target, Brutal Swing does +3 damage.
name: Brutal Swing

description: On 16+, Drops SPE by -5. A spray of sticky bubbles.
name: Bubble

description: On 18+, Drops SPE by -5. A bubble jet exploding with concussive force.
name: Bubble Beam

description: If the target holds a Berry, the user eats it and gets its effect. A produce-pilfering proboscis.
name: Bug Bite

description: Sonic. On 19+, Drops SDEF by -5. A reverberation of awful insect noises.
name: Bug Buzz

description: Flexes and gets ripped to Boost ATK and DEF by +5 each.
name: Bulk Up

description: Drops SPE by -5. A rippling tremor lays flat whatever’s nearby. If there is only one target, Bulldoze does +3 damage.
name: Bulldoze

description: Priority. The punch that won the West.
name: Bullet Punch

description: Multi-strike. Sprays salvos of seeds.
name: Bullet Seed

description: Fails if the user isn’t Fire-Type. Consumes all fuel for a last-ditch blast. The user loses the Fire Type until leaving battle, becoming typeless if they have no other Type.
name: Burn Up

description: Inflicts Burn on any targets who Boosted their Stats this round. Weaponizes flaming-hot envy. If there’s only one target, Burning Jealousy does +4 damage.
name: Burning Jealousy

description: Paralyzes the target with a high-pitched shock.
name: Buzzy Buzz

description: Deep mindfulness Boosts SATK and SDEF by +5 each.
name: Calm Mind

description:
The user changes their Type to match the environment.

  • Forests and grassland: Grass
  • Bodies of water and marshes: Water
  • Sand, dirt, and mud: Ground
  • Caves and mountains: Rock
  • Snow and tundra: Ice
  • Buildings and roads: Normal
  • Terrain caused by Moves: the Move’s Type
  • Other places: ask your GM
name: Camouflage

description: Drops compatible targets’ SATK by -10 with flustering flirting.
name: Captivate

description: Critical Hit on 18+. A seamitar technique like a thousandfold waves. Shell splinters leave a Stealth Rock hazard.
name: Ceaseless Edge

description: The PP costs for Fling, Bestow, and Present become 0 for the rest of the battle.
zEffect: Boost all the user's Stats by +5 each.
name: Celebrate

description: An electric charge Boosts SDEF by +5. The user’s next damaging Electric Move gets +1 Effectiveness. (Does not stack. Electric Moves that miss or fail still use up the charge.)
name: Charge

description: On 7+, Boosts SATK by +5. A bolt that attracts ions in the atmosphere.
name: Charge Beam

description: An adorable pout Drops the target’s ATK by -10.
name: Charm

description: Sonic. Confuses. Secondhand babbling baffles the target.
name: Chatter

description: A shower so cold that it Drops the target’s ATK by -5.
name: Chilling Water

description: Tells a chillingly bad joke before switching out in shame, summoning a snowstorm for 5 rounds. A real dud of a cold open.

description: Persistent pugilism that ignores the target’s DEF, SDEF, and Evasion Boosts.

description: The user loses 50% of their HP. (This isn’t Recoil.) Explosively decumulates photosynthesized energy.

description: Delayed. Throws lower-level wild targets out of battle, and switches out trained targets for a random party member.

description: Binds and Traps the target for 3 turns with the user’s shell, dealing 2 Ticks of HP Loss between rounds.
name: Clamp

description: Sonic. Boosts all Stats by +5 each in exchange for 3 Ticks of HP. Hit yourself with scales to make a real war cry.
zEffect: Boost the user's Save Bonus by +3.

description: A sketchy cloud makes the target sweat out its Drops and Boosts.

description: Drops the user’s DEF and SDEF by -5 each. An all-out offense that risks retaliation.

description: Boosts allies’ ATK and DEF by +5 each by sharing the user’s expertise.
zEffect: Boost the user's Save Bonus by +3.

description: Winds into a battle stance to Boost ATK and DEF by +10 each and Accuracy Rate by +2.

description: Axle breaks into the ground in a massive prehistoric explosion. Gets +6 Power if it’s super-effective.
name: Collision Course

description: Parayzes on 16+. A muscle car-worthy rush accelerates into the target.

description: Multi-strike. A parade of punches as reliable as Halley’s.

description: Confuses the target with a sinister dancing light.

description: Confuses on 19+. A minor mental assault.
name: Confusion

description: On 19+, Drops SPE by -5. Tangles the target in tendrils.
name: Constrict

description: The user retextures to become the Type of a Move they know of your choice for the rest of the battle.

description: Use any one Move the target did last round. (You may choose your targets.)

description: Scores a giant Z into the earth. For each target that acted this round, nullify their Abilities until they leave battle. If there’s only one target, Core Enforcer does +7 damage.
name: Core Enforcer

description: Ruins targets’ Held Items with acids clouds to be unusable for the rest of the battle. (They still hold the items.)

description: X-Rays from the moon Boost DEF and SDEF by +5.

description: The user swaddles itself with plushy puffs to Boost DEF by +15.

description: Clingy, puffy seeds that Drop SPE by -10. Grass-Types are immune to Cotton Spore.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.

description: Delayed. Whoever last damaged the user this round with a Physical Move loses twice the HP they made the user lose.
name: Counter

description: https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Court_Change_(move)
name: Court Change

description: Jealously steals the target’s held item if the user has none.
name: Covet

description: Critical Hit on 18+. A chitin claw cleaves the target.
name: Crabhammer

description: Super-Priority. A glamer protects allies from Status Moves this Round.
name: Crafty Shield

description: Critical Hit on 16+. An overhand clobber with both arms.
name: Cross Chop

description: Critical Hit on 18+ and Poisons on 19+. Venomous barbs from both sides.
name: Cross Poison

description: On 17+, Drops DEF by -5. Chews up the target with vicious fangs.
name: Crunch

description: On 11+, Drops DEF by -5. Nasty claws that can rend the toughest armor.

description: For every 10% of HP the target has lost, Crush Grip’s damage drops by -2. A punishment to make ye mighty tremble.

description:
Drops SPE by -5 but Boosts ATK and DEF by +5 each.
If the user is Ghost-Type, instead the user loses 50% HP and the target is Cursed bypassing Protection.
zEffect:
If not Ghost-Type, Boost ATK by +5.
If Ghost-Type, fully restore HP.
name: Curse

description: The user can effortlessly clear underbrush and saplings into smooth terrain.
name: Cut

description: Flinches on 17+. The user hates the target to death.
name: Dark Pulse

description: The targets fall Asleep after being dragged into endless dark.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Dark Void

description: Slams to the ground with a hook arm, ignoring the target’s DEF, SDEF, and Evasion Boosts.

description: A glittery glow that overwhelms emotions. If there’s only one target, Dazzling Gleam does +10 damage.
name: Dazzling Gleam

description: Bypasses Protection. Boosts the target’s ATK and SATK by +5 each by adorning with candy.
zEffect: Boost the user's Save Bonus by +3.

description: Surrounds the user with comrades to Boost DEF and SDEF by +5 each.
name: Defend Order

description: Tucks in limbs to Boost DEF by +5. For the rest of the battle, the user’s Rollout and Ice Ball get +10 Power.

description:
Drops target’s Evasion by -2. Removes fog, Terrain, Hazards, and targets’ Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, Mist, and Aurora Veil.

The user can blow away fog, smoke, and airborne debris effortlessly.
zEffect: Boost the user's Accuracy Rate by +2.

description: A spiteful curse on those who mean harm. Any foe that KOs the user before the user’s next turn Faints too.
zEffect: The user becomes the center of attention, as if it used Follow Me
name: Destiny Bond

description: Super-Priority. The user anticipates and protects from the next Move that targets it.
name: Detect

description: On 11+, Boosts DEF by +10. A gale of sharpened gemstones swirls around the user. If there’s only one target, Diamond Storm does +7 damage.
name: Diamond Storm

description:
This turn: Tunnels deep underground. Next turn: Surfaces and attacks with Dig.

The user can burrow through earth as easily as they travel atop it.
name: Dig

description: Critical Hit on 18+. On 10+, roll d3: the target becomes 1) Poisoned, 2) Paralyzed, or 3) Drowsy. Lashes with ruinous claws.
name: Dire Claw

description: Mental binding that Disables the last Move the target used for 4 rounds. (Fails if a Move is already disabled.)
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Disable

description: Sonic. Emotionally damages aggressors with their own guilt.
name: Disarming Voice

description: Paralyzes on 15+. An uncontrolled release of electricity. If there is only one target, Discharge does +5 damage.
name: Discharge

description:
This turn: The user plunges underwater. Next turn: The user surfaces and attacks with Dive.

The user can swim deep underwater indefinitely.
name: Dive

description: Confuses on 17+. A head-rattling strike that makes the target see birdies.
name: Dizzy Punch

description: Sketches the very essence of the target, changing an Ability slot of the user and its ally Pokémon to match a random Ability slot of the target.
name: Doodle

description: Bypasses Protection. Foretells doom this turn. At the end of the user’s next turn, Doom Desire hits the target or its switched in replacement, even if the user is no longer battling.
name: Doom Desire

description: Double Strike. The old one-two.
name: Double Hit

description: Double Strike. The new one-two.
name: Double Iron Bash

description: Double Strike. The user’s hind legs lash out once each.
name: Double Kick

description: Fails if the user isn’t Electric-Type. Fully discharges into a damaging defibrillation. The user loses the Electric Type until leaving battle, becoming typeless if they have no other Type.
name: Double Shock

description: Multi-strike. Gives the target what-for, and what-three, and what-two…
name: Double Slap

description: Illusory copies of the user Boost Evasion by +2.
name: Double Team

description: Recoil ⅓. A reckless tackle with no regard for safety.
name: Double-Edge

description: Drops the user’s SATK by -10 afterwards. Showers heaven’s wrath on some poor sap.
name: Draco Meteor

description: Drops the user’s DEF and SDEF by -5 each. The realization of divinity for you, the realization of mortality for them.
name: Dragon Ascent

description: Paralyzes on 15+. A crackle of supernatural heat.
name: Dragon Breath

description: A gash that could tear a knight’s armor.
name: Dragon Claw

description: A mystical, ancient dance Boosts ATK and SPE by +5 each.
name: Dragon Dance

description: The user chooses whether Dragon Darts has Double Strike or hits 2 targets. Sends the children out to play.
name: Dragon Darts

description: For each Tick of HP the user has lost, Dragon Energy’s damage is reduced by -2. A furious exhalation of draconic rage. If there is only one target, Dragon Energy gets +24 extra damage before its effect.
name: Dragon Energy

description: Swings its body like a hammer from the heavens.
name: Dragon Hammer

description: A wave-motion bomb like they tell of in legends.
name: Dragon Pulse

description: The target loses 30 HP regardless of Stats, Weakness, or Resistance. (Immunities still work.) A mote of frizzling indignation.
name: Dragon Rage

description: Flinches on 17+. A menacing dive from wrathful heavens.
name: Dragon Rush

description: Delayed. Tosses lower-level wild targets out of battle, and switches out trained targets for a random party member.
name: Dragon Tail

description: Absorbs natural chi rhythms with a fist to Drain half the damage dealt.
name: Drain Punch

description: A big wet smooch that Drains ⅔ the damage dealt.
name: Draining Kiss

description: Only affects Asleep characters. Comes for the target in the dreaming hours to Drain ½ the damage dealt.
name: Dream Eater

description: A corkscrew strike with a spinning beak.
name: Drill Peck

description: Critical Hit on 18+. A corkscrew tackle that can pierce mountains.
name: Drill Run

description: Drops the target’s SPE by -5. A musical interlude teaches plants how to fight.
name: Drum Beating

description: Double Strike. Heavenward then heckward blows in quick succession.
name: Dual Chop

description: Double Strike. Flaps ‘em on both sides.
name: Dual Wingbeat

description: +1 Effectiveness if the target is Dynamaxed.
name: Dynamax Cannon

description: Confuses the target. A fist exploding with concentrated power.
name: Dynamic Punch

description: On 16+, Drops SDEF by -5. The ground erupts with geothermal energy.
name: Earth Power

description: +1 Effectiveness against underground targets. The ground cracks and buckles with seismic shocks. If there is only one target, Earthquake does +7 damage.
name: Earthquake

description: Sonic. Each use by any character in consecutive Rounds adds +5 Power to Echoed Voice (maximum 34).
name: Echoed Voice

description: Drops SATK by -10. A tingling sensation unsettles and distracts the target.
name: Eerie Impulse

description: Sonic. Drops target’s PP -3. A spiteful hex that steals away the will to fight.
name: Eerie Spell

description: Lobs a big ol’ egg.
name: Egg Bomb

description: Invert the target’s Boosts to DEF before doing damage. The initial incisor.
name: Egg Tooth

description: The field becomes Electric for 5 rounds. Characters touching Electric Terrain are immune to Sleep, and their Electric Moves gain +5 damage.
name: Electric Terrain

description: The target’s next Move is Electric instead of its usual Type.
name: Electrify

description: Also add the user’s SPE for Electro Ball’s damage. The target also subtracts its SPE from the damage. A zigzagging ball of lightning that closes in erratically.
name: Electro Ball

description: Races at ultrafast speeds to pierce with futuristic electricity. Power is boosted more than usual if it’s super-effective.
name: Electro Drift

description: Drops SPE by -5. A tingling, tangling silk net hinders movement. If there’s only one target, Electroweb does +3 damage.
name: Electroweb

description: The target can’t use held items or have items used on it for the rest of the battle, after the spirit of thievery surrounds them.
name: Embargo

description: Burns on 18+. A gob of fire scorches the target.
name: Ember

description: Rousing applause makes the target repeat their last Move for their next 3 turns; fails if they haven’t used a Move yet.
name: Encore

description: The target’s HP becomes the same as the user’s in a daredevil maneuver.
name: Endeavor

description: Super-Priority. If a Move would Faint the user this round, instead set the user’s HP to 1. Fails if used consecutively.
name: Endure

description: On 17+, Drops SDEF by -5. A chloroclasm of photosynthesized ordnance.
name: Energy Ball

description: Choose one of the user’s Abilities. Wavelength synchronization overwrites the target’s Ability in that same slot.
name: Entrainment

description: For each Tick the user has lost, Eruption’s damage drops by -1. A furious lava explosion. If there’s only one target, Eruption does +12 damage.
name: Eruption

description: Critical Hit on 18+. Boosts the user’s SPE by +5. Slashes with aura-enriched wings.
name: Esper Wing

description: Exhausting. Collects strange energies into a gigantic blast.
name: Eternabeam

description: Does +5 damage and targets Foes in Zone if the user stands on Psychic Terrain. A groundbound psychic lens erupts into a weird prism.
name: Expanding Force

description: The user Faints in a tremendous kaboom. If there is only one target, Explosion does +22 damage.
name: Explosion

description: Flinches on 19+. An odd, unseeable force buffets the target.
name: Extrasensory

description: Priority. Goes before other Priority Moves, with swiftness too fast for the eye to follow.
name: Extreme Speed

description: If the user is Burnt, Paralyzed, or Poisoned, Facade does +8 damage and ignores Burn’s ATK penalty. The illusion of weakness drops others’ guard.
name: Facade

description: Everyone in Zone is Trapped during their next turn.
name: Fairy Lock

description: A breeze gets glitter in the targets’ eyes.
name: Fairy Wind

description: Super-Priority. A sudden hand clap Flinches the target. Only usable the user’s first turn after entering battle.
name: Fake Out

description: Feigned distress tugs at heartstrings and Drops SDEF by -10.
name: Fake Tears

description: Lies and hair come together in the worst way.
name: False Surrender

description: Can’t damage targets below 1 HP.
name: False Swipe

description: Drops targets’ ATK by -10 by plastering them with downy feathers.
name: Feather Dance

description: Priority. Bypasses and removes Protection. An untimely defense is no defense at all.
name: Feint

description: Sidles up to the target, then strikes without warning.
name: Feint Attack

description: If Fell Stinger Faints a target, Boost the user’s ATK by +15. Trades power for a possible burst of triumph.
name: Fell Stinger

description: On 11+, Boosts the user’s SATK by +5. Fans its flames with vigorous movement.
name: Fiery Dance

description: Flinches on 17+. A fire of pure hate that makes even brave hearts flinch. If there is only one target, Fiery Wrath does +6 damage.
name: Fiery Wrath

description: Sheds flesh to Boost ATK, SATK, and SPE by +10 each and lose 50% of maximum HP. (Fails at ≤50% HP.)
name: Fillet Away

description: Sets the user’s HP to 0, and the target loses HP equal to the HP the user lost. Risks everything in a blaze of fighting spirit.
name: Final Gambit

description: Burns on 19+. Pillars of flame erupt on the target.
name: Fire Blast

description: Burns on 18, Flinches on 19. On 20, Burns and Flinches. Chomps while breathing fire.
name: Fire Fang

description: Drops DEF by -5. A burning whip cracks the target’s guard.
name: Fire Lash

description:
If an ally orders a different Pledge Move before Fire Pledge, instead Fire Pledge attacks, does +10 damage, and for 4 rounds has an effect depending on the other Pledge:

  • Grass Pledge: A brushfire hurts non-Fire-Type foes in-Zone for 2 Ticks between rounds.
  • Water Pledge: A rainbow doubles in-Zone party’s Effect Rates.
name: Fire Pledge

description: Burns on 19+. A fist wrapped in flame.
name: Fire Punch

description: Binds and Traps the target for 3 rounds, dealing 2 Ticks of HP Loss between rounds. Swirling flames cut off escape.
name: Fire Spin

description: Priority. Only usable the first round after starting battle or switching in. A head-on entrance collision.
name: First Impression

description: Fishious Rend does +11 damage if attacking a target that hasn’t moved yet this Round. The user’s maw is reinforced by its gills.
name: Fishious Rend

description: Add the user’s level and subtract the target’s level from the attack roll. Ignores changes to Evasion and Accuracy. The target plummets into a crack in the earth and Faints. Fails on targets Immune to Ground.
name: Fissure

description: For each Tick the user has lost, Flail does +2 damage. Wriggles wildly in desperation.
name: Flail

description: Other foes in the same Zone as the target lose a Tick of HP. Burning oil that spatters on impact.
name: Flame Burst

description: Boosts SPE by +5. A burnout dash that leaves scorch marks.
name: Flame Charge

description: Burns on 19+. The user cloaks themselves in fire and somersaults into the target.
name: Flame Wheel

description: Burns on 19+. An intense blast of fire roasts the target.
name: Flamethrower

description: Recoil ⅓. Burns on 19+. Launches into the target, searing both combatants.
name: Flare Blitz

description:
Drops Accuracy Rate by -2. A quick, bright light dazzles targets.

The user can illuminate the nearby area effortlessly.
name: Flash

description: On 19+, Drops SDEF by -5. Light reflecting off the user is focused into a silver stream.
name: Flash Cannon

description: An unexpected compliment Confuses the target and Boosts their SATK by +5.
name: Flatter

description: Overclocks the user to unleash a mighty beam, Dropping their SATK by -10.
name: Fleur Cannon

description:
Lobs a held item, which determines Fling’s Power. Some items add effects when used for Fling; Berries always activate their effect on impact.

20 Power: Iron Ball
14 Power: Fossils, Hard Stone, Rare Bone, Plates, Deep Sea Tooth, Grip Claw, Thick Club, Poison Barb
8 Power: Everything else
name: Fling

description: If this move deals damage, the user then switches out, even if Trapped. A momentum shift worthy of Olympic swimmers.
name: Flip Turn

description: Flinches on 15+. A calm float becomes a breakneck dive.
name: Floaty Fall

description: Heals 5 Ticks. Heals another 3 Ticks if the target stands on Grassy Terrain.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Floral Healing

description: Bypasses Protection. Boosts Grass-Types’ DEF by +5 with hippie magic.
name: Flower Shield

description: Always a Critical Hit. Tosses a bouquet rigged so you’re the next to be marred.
name: Flower Trick

description:
First turn: The user ascends into the air. Next turn: The user dives towards the target and attacks.

The user can soar tirelessly through the sky.
name: Fly

description: Deals Flying damage instead if the user wishes. A diving aerial drop.
name: Flying Press

description: On 19+, Drops SDEF by -5. A bullet of fighting spirit.
name: Focus Blast

description: Boosts Critical Rate by +3. Quiets turmoil inside, to cause turmoil outside. Does not stack.
name: Focus Energy

description: Delayed. This Move automatically misses any target that did not damage the user with a Move this round.
name: Focus Munch

description: Delayed. At the end of the round, if the user wasn’t damaged by a Move, attack with Focus Punch. Devastating if undisturbed.
name: Focus Punch

description: Super-Priority. This round, if foes use Moves that could target the user, those Moves do. Draws attention as a diversion.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Follow Me

description: Paralyzes on 18+. A glowing palm thrust that locks up pressure points.
name: Force Palm

description: While the user and target stay in battle, ignore the target’s Evasion Boosts and Normal/Fighting Immunities. True seeing that reads intentions.
zEffect: Boost the user's Critical Rate by +2.
name: Foresight

description: The target becomes Grass in addition to its other Types. The woods hide dark secrets. (Resists Electric/Grass/Ground/Water; weak to Bug/Fire/Flying/Ice/Poison; immune to Leech Seed, Powder moves, and Spore.)
zEffect: Boost all the user's Stats by +5 each.
name: Forest's Curse

description: Uses the target’s ATK instead of the user’s. They don’t know their own strength.
name: Foul Play

description: This turn: Generates an iceberg ringed with electricity. Next turn: Attacks with Freeze Shock. Paralyzes on 15+.
name: Freeze Shock

description: Freezes on 19+. Super Effective against Water. Squeezes out moisture with rapid cooling.
name: Freeze-Dry

description: Freezes on 19+. A psychic stare so cold it leaves you frozen.
name: Freezing Glare

description: A frozen haze removes all Boosts and Drops from characters on the field.
name: Freezy Frost

description: Exhausting. Trees rapidly grow into the target, walloping them.
name: Frenzy Plant

description: Always a Critical Hit. Cold air suffuses the target from every angle.
name: Frost Breath

description: If the user fainted today, Frustration gets +15 Power. An angry outburst.
name: Frustration

description: Multi-strike. Repeated jabs pepper the target.
name: Fury Attack

description: When Fury Cutter deals damage, it gets +5 Power (maximum +20). If the user chooses another action, misses, or leaves battle, reset Fury Cutter’s Power. Little-by-little, determination overcomes.
name: Fury Cutter

description: Multi-strike. Rakes with a flurry of claws.
name: Fury Swipes

description: Fusion Bolt does +6 damage if Fusion Flare was used this round or last round by anyone. Heat lightning blasts the target.
name: Fusion Bolt

description: Fusion Flare does +6 damage if Fusion Bolt was used this round or last round by anyone. An arc burn scores the target.
name: Fusion Flare

description:
Predicts unfortune the turn it is used.
At the end of the user’s next turn, Future Sight hits the target or any switched replacement, even if the user is no longer on the field or the target is Protected.
name: Future Sight

description: Remove the target’s Ability of your choice until the end of the encounter by dousing them with stomach juices.
name: Gastro Acid

description: Double Strike. Crushes the target between spinning sprockets.
name: Gear Grind

description: Generates energy to Boost ATK and SATK of allies and the user with Plus or Minus by +5 each.
name: Gear Up

description: This turn: The user collects energy from the earth. Next turn: Boosts SATK, SDEF, and SPE by +10 each.
zEffect: Boost all the user's Stats by +5 each.
name: Geomancy

description: Absorbs nutrients to Drain half the damage dealt. Could fallow a field overnight.
name: Giga Drain

description: Exhausting. The user’s adrenaline spikes to exert all their energy at once.
name: Giga Impact

description: Swings the user’s whole body to strike with a huge hammer. This move can’t be used twice in a row.
name: Gigaton Hammer

description: Hurls an icicle so sharp it could pierce anything. If there’s only one target, Glacial Lance does +10 damage.
name: Glacial Lance

description: Drops SPE by -5. An echo of the Ice Age. If there’s only one target, Glaciate does +4 damage.
name: Glaciate

description: Throws the entire body into a reckless charge. Attacks targeting the user until the user’s next turn can’t miss and get +1 Effectiveness.
name: Glaive Rush

description: Paralyzes with a snake’s gaze.
name: Glare

description: Sets Light Screen. (Special Moves targeting yourself and affected allies get -1 Effectiveness for 5 rounds. Lasts 1 round less for each ally (except the user) you choose to target.) Slams with a psychic wall.
name: Glitzy Glow

description: Confuses on 19+. Hit them around the shoulder and shrug.
name: Goblin Punch

description: Grass Knot’s Power is equal to the target’s weight divided by 10 (maximum 36). Trips the target with a grass snare.
name: Grass Knot

description:
If an ally orders a different Pledge Move before Grass Pledge, instead Grass Pledge attacks, does +10 damage, and for 4 rounds has an effect depending on the other Pledge:

  • Fire Pledge: A brushfire hurts foe in-Zone non-Fire-Types for 2 Ticks between rounds.
  • Water Pledge: A swamp quarters in-Zone foes’ SPE.
name: Grass Pledge

description: Sonic. The target falls Asleep as a pleasant tune sings through grass blades.
name: Grass Whistle

description: Priority if the user stands on Grassy Terrain. Slides through slick grass like quicksilver.
name: Grassy Glide

description: The Zone becomes Grassy for 5 rounds. (Characters standing on Grassy Terrain heal a Tick at the start of each round and damaging Grass Moves get +5 damage.)
name: Grassy Terrain

description: Drops the target’s DEF by -5. If Gravity is in effect, Grav Apple does +10 damage. An apple a day keeps the doctor in business.
name: Grav Apple

description: For the next 5 rounds, Moves that require being airborne can’t be used (Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Sky Drop, Splash, Telekinesis), everyone loses Immunity to Ground, and everyone’s Accuracy Rate is Boosted by +6.
name: Gravity

description: Sonic. A plaintive whine Drops ATK by -5.
name: Growl

description: Boosts ATK and SATK by +5 each, or +10 if it is Sunny. Chloroplasts release energy all at once.
name: Growth

description: If another character’s Move Faints the user before the user’s next turn, disable that Move for the rest of the battle. A vendetta stronger than death.
zEffect: The user becomes the center of attention, as if it used Follow Me
name: Grudge

description: A strange power averages the user’s DEF and SDEF with the target’s until the end of the battle. Ignore Boosts/Drops.
name: Guard Split

description: The user and target trade DEF and SDEF Boosts/Drops via a strange power.
name: Guard Swap

description: Add the user’s level and subtract the target’s level from the attack roll. Ignore Evasion and Accuracy Rate. Faints the target with vicious pincers. Fails on targets Immune to Normal.
name: Guillotine

description: Poisons on 15+. Dunks the target with filthy garbage.
name: Gunk Shot

description: Hits high-flying targets (like those using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop) with +10 Power. A small dervish of wind.
name: Gust

description: Add the target’s SPE to Gyro Ball’s damage, and subtract the user’s SPE. The user stores momentum like a flywheel, then rams the target.
name: Gyro Ball

description: The weather becomes Hail for 5 rounds. (Non-Ice Types take 1 Tick of damage between rounds.)
name: Hail

description: Drops the user’s SPE by -5. An overhead fist from a power stance.
name: Hammer Arm

description: Scatters coins worth ten times the user’s level if used in battle. The winner of the battle gets to pocket the coins.
zEffect: Boosts all the user's Stats by +5 each.
name: Happy Hour

description: Stiffens and tenses muscles to Boost DEF by +5.
name: Harden

description: An ominous black mist removes all Boosts and Drops from characters on the field.
name: Haze

description: Recoil ¼. A fierce charge cushioned by a mighty afro.
name: Head Charge

description: Recoil ½. A hazardous headbutt only used by blockheads.
name: Head Smash

description: Flinches on 15+. The user clonks their forehead on the target’s.
name: Headbutt

description: Drops the user’s DEF and SDEF by -5 each. Assumes a low stance for a full-body sumo charge.
name: Headlong Rush

description: A soothing chime cures all Status Problem for allies and the user.
name: Heal Bell

description: Until the target switches out, they can’t gain HP and their Moves that Heal or Drain are disabled. Weaponized entropy.
name: Heal Block

description: Heal 50% max HP. Commands comrades to patch up with beeswax.
name: Heal Order

description: Heals 50% of the target’s max HP with a wave of good feelings. (Can’t target the user.)
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Heal Pulse

description: The user Faints. Its replacement that switches in is healed to Max HP and cured of Status Problems.
name: Healing Wish

description: Flinches on 15+. Smothers the target after acting cute.
name: Heart Stamp

description: Exchange all Boosts/Drops with the target. A little empathy never stopped a fight.
zEffect: Boost the user's Critical Rate by +2.
name: Heart Swap

description: For every 10lbs. the user outweighs the target by, Heat Crash does +1 damage (maximum 48). A redhot wrestleslam.
name: Heat Crash

description: Burns on 19+. Hot winds bake foes. If there’s only one target, Heat Wave does +7 damage.
name: Heat Wave

description: For every 10lbs. the user outweighs the target by, Heavy Slam does +1 damage (maximum 48). A cast-iron crushing.
name: Heavy Slam

description: Super-Priority. Cooperates with the target, adding +10 damage to their damaging Move.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Helping Hand

description: +7 Power against targets with Persistent Status conditions. A vicious attack fueled by misfortune.
name: Hex

description:
On learning Hidden Power for the first time, roll d20 for its Type:

  • 1: Bug
  • 2: Dark
  • 3: Dragon
  • 4: Electric
  • 5: Fairy
  • 6: Fighting
  • 7: Fire
  • 8: Flying
  • 9: Ghost
  • 10: Grass
  • 11: Ground
  • 12: Ice
  • 13: Poison
  • 14: Psychic
  • 15: Rock
  • 16: Steel
  • 17: Water
  • 18–20: Roll again.
name: Hidden Power

description: The user pushes off the earth with their tremendous bulk-moving power.
name: High Horsepower

description: If High Jump Kick misses, the user loses 5 Ticks. A risky rising knee strike.
name: High Jump Kick

description: Boosts ATK by +5 and Accuracy Rate by +2. Sharpens claws to strike true.
name: Hone Claws

description: Jousts with a sharp horn.
name: Horn Attack

description: Add the user’s level to the attack roll, and subtract the target’s level from the attack roll. Ignores changes to Evasion and Accuracy. Faints the target with a high-speed spinning horn. Fails on targets Immune to Normal.
name: Horn Drill

description: The user Drains half the damage dealt. Rootlike horns extract energy.
name: Horn Leech

description: A bestial battlecry Boosts ATK by +5 for allies and the user.
name: Howl

description: Confuses on 15+. If Sunny, Accuracy Rate is -9. If Rainy, can’t miss. Can hit high-flying targets (such as those using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop). A windstorm catapults the target into the sky.
name: Hurricane

description: Exhausting. A pressurized lake decompresses on the target.
name: Hydro Cannon

description: High-pressure water blasts the target like a firehose.
name: Hydro Pump

description: Blasts with boiling water. Hydro Steam ignores Harsh Sunlight and instead gets +8 Power.
name: Hydro Steam

description: Exhausting. Concentrates energy into a blast of destruction.
name: Hyper Beam

description: Bypasses and removes Protection. Spins at high speed to pierce through.
name: Hyper Drill

description: Flinches on 19+. Powerful incisors crush the target.
name: Hyper Fang

description: Sonic. Unsafe decibel levels echo through foes. If there’s only one target, Hyper Voice does +6 damage.
name: Hyper Voice

description: Bypasses Protection and Drops DEF by -5. A multi-arm pummeling from between dimensions.
name: Hyperspace Fury

description: Bypasses Protection. Warps behind the target and strikes.
name: Hyperspace Hole

description: The target falls Asleep from hypnotic suggestion.
name: Hypnosis

description: Use Ice Ball each turn until it hits 5 times or misses once. Each successful hit increases Ice Ball’s damage by +5 until it ends. Gathers strength like a snowball rolling down a snowy hill.
name: Ice Ball

description: Freezes on 19+. Sucks heat out of the air in a frigid line.
name: Ice Beam

description: This turn: The user creates a frostbiting iceberg. Next turn: The user attacks with Ice Burn. Burns on 15+.
name: Ice Burn

description: Freezes on 18, Flinches on 19. On 20, Freezes and Flinches. Chomps while breathing ice.
name: Ice Fang

description: Drops the user’s SPE by -5. Swings a mighty frozen fist.
name: Ice Hammer

description: Freezes on 19+. A fist encased in ice.
name: Ice Punch

description: Priority. Hurls flash-frozen ice shards.
name: Ice Shard

description: Coats feet in ice and twirls into the target, destroying any Terrain in Zone.
name: Ice Spinner

description: Flinches on 15+. Drives a frozen stalactite into the target.
name: Icicle Crash

description: Multi-strike. Peppers the target with needles of ice.
name: Icicle Spear

description: Drops Speed by -5. A cold breeze causes shivering. If there’s only one target, Icy Wind does +3 damage.
name: Icy Wind

description: A sympathetic seal Disables all foes’ Moves the user knows for the rest of the battle.
name: Imprison

description: A flambé chars all Berries and Gems the targets hold. If there’s only one target, Incinerate does +3 damage.
name: Incinerate

description: Burns on 16+. Gets +6 Power against targets with Persistent Status conditions. A procession of myriad fiery souls.
name: Infernal Parade

description: Burns the target. Seven rings of flame surround a hapless soul.
name: Inferno

description: Binds and Traps the target for 3 rounds, dealing 2 Ticks of HP Loss between rounds. Creepy-crawlies surround and climb over the target.
name: Infestation

description: The user roots into the earth and becomes Trapped. Between rounds, they heal 1 Tick until they leave battle.
name: Ingrain

description: Commands the target to repeat its last Move, if it can. This second move still consumes PP.
name: Instruct

description: Priority. An ion cloud disperses in the Zone. Normal Moves passing through the Zone become Electric.
name: Ion Deluge

description: A hardening steel skin Boosts DEF by +10.
name: Iron Defense

description: Flinches on 15+. A steel-splitting strike.
name: Iron Head

description: On 19+, Drops DEF by -5. A steel-hard tail slams into the target.
name: Iron Tail

description: Traps the user and target until either leave battle. A stubborn bite that won’t let go.
name: Jaw Lock

description: Priority. Summons a torrent-wrapped fist to punch at blinding speed.
name: Jet Punch

description: Judgment’s Type matches the Type of a Plate the user holds. Countless shots of light punish the target.
name: Judgment

description: If Jump Kick misses, the user loses 5 Ticks. An aerial dropkick.
name: Jump Kick

description: Allies and the user heal 3 Ticks and cure Burn, Paralysis, Poison, and Sleep. Nature gives sanctuary to those who ask.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Jungle Healing

description: Critical Hit on 17+. A sharp chop honed in the dojo.
name: Karate Chop

description: Drops Accuracy Rate by -2. Bends a spoon as a distraction.
name: Kinesis

description: Super-Priority. Protects the user. If the prevented Move made Contact, Drop the attacker’s ATK by -5. A bulwark that could stop a revolution.
name: King's Shield

description: If the target holds any items, destroys a random item the target holds and Knock Off does +7 damage. Bullying.
name: Knock Off

description: Slashes after a prostrating bow that makes the target let down its guard.
name: Kowtow Cleave

description: The earth resents its polluters intensely. If there’s only one target, Land’s Wrath does +6 damage.
name: Land’s Wrath

description: Absolute concentration. The user’s next Move is a Critical Hit if it doesn’t miss.
name: Laser Focus

description: Does +10 damage if the user’s Stats Dropped this round. Venting frustration only makes things worse, but at least it makes things worse for your enemies too.
name: Lash Out

description: Only usable if the user has less than 4 PP. Saving the best for last.
name: Last Resort

description: Avenges the fallen. Gets +4 Power for each time an ally in the user’s party fainted this battle.
name: Last Respects

description: Burns on 16+. Pyroclasm erupts from the user. If there is only one target, Lava Plume does +5 damage.
name: Lava Plume

description: Critical Hit on 18+. A sword slash with a knife-edged leaf.
name: Leaf Blade

description: Drops the user’s SATK by -10. Whips up a squall of stinging leaves.
name: Leaf Storm

description: On 15+, Drops Accuracy Rate by -1. Encircles the target with whirling, sharp leaves.
name: Leaf Tornado

description: Pelts the target with leaves.
name: Leafage

description: Sucks blood to Drain half the damage dealt.
name: Leech Life

description: Until the target leaves battle, Leech Seed’s user Drains a Tick of HP from them between rounds. Grass-Types and targets Immune to Grass are immune to Leech Seed. A parasitic mistletoe blossom.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Leech Seed

description: Drops DEF by -5 by unsettling the target with a nasty look.
name: Leer

description: Paralyzes on 15+. Gross.
name: Lick

description: Each ally including the user Heals 3 Ticks. Refreshing waters keep everybody fresh for the fight.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Life Dew

description: Recoil ½. The terrible power of the Ultimate Weapon.
name: Light of Ruin

description: Special Moves targeting yourself and affected allies get -1 Effectiveness for 5 rounds. Light Screen lasts 1 round less for each ally (except the user) you choose to target when using it.
name: Light Screen

description: On 17+, Drops DEF by -5. Breaks down the target with a full-force water blast.
name: Liquidation

description: With deadeye aim, the next Move by the user at the target can’t miss.
name: Lock-On

description: The target falls Asleep from a heavenly kiss. (Actually, it passes out from fear.)
name: Lovely Kiss

description: Low Kick’s Power is equal to the target’s weight divided by 10 (maximum 36). The bigger they are…
name: Low Kick

description: Strikes the target’s legs to Drop SPE by -5.
name: Low Sweep

description: Moves targeting you and your allies get can’t be Critical Hits for 5 rounds.
name: Lucky Chant

description: Unleashes a peculiar light that flummoxes the target to Drop SDEF by -10.
name: Lumina Crash

description: A crescent prayer cures Poison, Burn, and Paralysis and Heals 50% max HP.
name: Lunar Blessing

description: The user Faints. The Pokémon that switches in is fully healed, has all PP restored, and cured of all Status Problems.
name: Lunar Dance

description: Drops ATK by -5. Leaps at the target, persuading them to avoid getting too close to a bug again.
name: Lunge

description: Drops SDEF by -5 on an Even-Numbered Roll. A mind-bending release of light.
name: Luster Purge

description: Priority. You could hear the sound barrier break if the impact didn’t drown it out.
name: Mach Punch

description: Super-Priority. Reflect Status Moves targeting Magic Coat’s user this round at the Move’s user.
name: Magic Coat

description: Changes the target’s typing to Psychic with a concotion cloud.
name: Magic Powder

description: For the next 5 rounds, all held items lose their effects. Weaponized ascetism.
name: Magic Room

description: Curious leaves chase down the target.
name: Magical Leaf

description: Confuses on 16+. A dizzying driveby accelerates into the target.
name: Magical Torque

description: Binds and Traps the target for 3 rounds, dealing 2 Ticks of HP Loss between rounds. A roiling cauldron of superheated lava.
name: Magma Storm

description: Steel orbs stick to the target, then rupture.
name: Magnet Bomb

description: The user gains Levitate for 5 rounds by manipulating electromagnetic fields.
name: Magnet Rise

description: Strange currents Boost the DEF and SDEF of allies and the user with Plus or Minus by +5 each.
name: Magnetic Flux

description: Magnitude’s Power is equal to the Attack Roll. Magnitude can hit underground targets with doubled Power, like those using Dig. Richter roulette. If there is only one target, Magnitude’s Power doubles.
name: Magnitude

description: Sprays a gold rush of coins, then Drops the user’s SATK by -5. Scatters coins worth 10× the user’s level if used in battle; the battle’s winner gets to pocket the coins. If there is only one target, Make It Rain gets +9 Power.
name: Make It Rain

description: Protects allies and the user from non-Status Moves. Mat Block can only be used on the round the user enters battle.
name: Mat Block

description: If the foe has declared a Damaging Move but has yet to resolve that Move, becomes that same Move on that foe. Gets extra +5 damage for the copied Move.
zEffect: Boost SPE by +10, then use the copied Move's corresponding Z-Move.
name: Me First

description: Bypasses Protection. The target can’t switch out or Shift to other Zones while the user stays in battle. Pins the target with an arresting stare.
name: Mean Look

description: Boosts ATK by +5. Concentration in a yoga pose unlocks the body’s strength.
name: Meditate

description: Desiccates the target to Drain half the damage dealt.
name: Mega Drain

description: A megaton heel strike.
name: Mega Kick

description: A megaton uppercut.
name: Mega Punch

description: A scooping horn strike that could flip a tank.
name: Megahorn

description: The user faints, but Drop the target’s ATK and SATK by -10 each.
zEffect: Fully restore the switched-in ally's HP.
name: Memento

description: The last character who damaged the user loses HP equal to 1.5× the total damage the user has taken since the beginning of this Round.
name: Metal Burst

description: On 18+, Boosts ATK by +5, even if it misses. Steel-sharp claws rake the target.
name: Metal Claw

description: Sonic. Drops SDEF by -10. An awful rasp that leaves ears ringing.
name: Metal Sound

description: Exhausting. Jousts with a skyscreaming charge.
name: Meteor Assault

description: This turn: Boost the user’s SATK by +5. Next turn: Blasts pallasite power at the target.
name: Meteor Beam

description: On 18+, Boosts ATK by +5, even if it misses. A punch like a meteor impact.
name: Meteor Mash

description: Metronome randomly uses any other Move.
name: Metronome

description: Heals half Max HP with nourishing bone juice.
zEffect: Remove all Stat Drops on the user.
name: Milk Drink

description: The Move the target last used replaces Mimic on the user’s Move List for the rest of the battle.
zEffect: Boost the user's Accuracy Rate by +2.
name: Mimic

description: The user loses 50% of their HP. (This isn’t Recoil.) The user’s head explodes. If there is only one target, Mind Blown does +12 damage.
name: Mind Blown

description: With supernatural sense, the next Move by the user at the target can’t miss.
name: Mind Reader

description: Boosts Evasion by +4, but gives +1 Effectiveness to incoming Body Slam, Stomp, Dragon Rush, Heat Crash, Flying Press, and Heavy Slam Moves. Compresses the user’s body.
name: Minimize

description: While the user and target stay in battle, the user ignores the target’s Evasion Boosts and Psychic Immunities. The eye of justice is unswayed.
name: Miracle Eye

description: Delayed. The last character that damaged the user with a Special Move this round loses twice the HP they made the user lose. Mirror Coat can’t hit targets immune to Psychic.
name: Mirror Coat

description: Sonic. Parroty mimicry uses the Move the target used last. You may choose new targets for it.
zEffect: Boost ATK by +10, then use the copied Move's corresponding Z-Move.
name: Mirror Move

description: On 16+, Drops Accuracy Rate by -2. A flash of light from the user’s polished body.
name: Mirror Shot

description: Affected allies can’t have their Stats changed by other characters for 5 rounds. Mist lasts 1 round less for each ally (including the user) you choose to target when using it.
name: Mist

description: On 11+, Drops SATK by -5. A ball of dew douses the target.
name: Mist Ball

description: Does +10 damage if the user stands on Misty Terrain. The user faints in a fantastical kaboom.
name: Misty Explosion

description: The field becomes Misty for 5 rounds. (Characters standing on Misty Terrain get +1 Resistance to Dragon-Type damage and are immune to Burn, Paralysis, Poison, Sleep, Freeze, and Confusion.)
name: Misty Terrain

description: On 15+, Drops SATK by -5. A bundle of lunar X-rays.
name: Moonblast

description: A sinister ray that ignores targets’ Abilities while attacking.
name: Moongeist Beam

description: Heals a number of Ticks depending on the Weather: 5 in clear weather, 8 in Harsh Sunlight, and 3 for others.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Moonlight

description: Heals a number of Ticks depending on the Weather: 5 in clear weather, 8 in Harsh Sunlight, and 3 for others.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Morning Sun

description: Poisons targets, destroys all Hazards targeting allies, and removes the user’s Trapped or Leech Seed status. A killer twist around the mortal coil.
name: Mortal Spin

description: Flinches on 15+. Drives huge hailstones with an iceberg wind.
name: Mountain Gale

description: On 16+, Drops Accuracy Rate by -1. A hard-packed ball of mud bursts on the target.
name: Mud Bomb

description: Drops SPE by -5. A blob of wet mud clings to the target.
name: Mud Shot

description: Characters in the Zone Resist Electric an extra step for 5 rounds. Frolicking in the mud makes a mess.
name: Mud Sport

description: Drops Accuracy Rate by -1. A spray of mud right in the eyes.
name: Mud-Slap

description: On 16+, Drops Accuracy Rate by -1. Drops a swamp on ‘em. If there’s only one target, Muddy Water does +6 damage.
name: Muddy Water

description: Slams into the target cloaked in high energy. Multi-Attack’s Type matches a Held Type Memory.
name: Multi-Attack

description: Drops SATK by -5 with a sealing ring of flame.
name: Mystical Fire

description: A mysterious force Boosts the higher of the user’s ATK and DEF, then does the same for their SATK and SDEF.
name: Mystical Power

description: Boosts SATK by +10. Bad intentions have a way of gripping the mind.
name: Nasty Plot

description: Natural Gift’s Power and Type depend on the user’s held Berry which is destroyed (not consumed). If the user has two berries, choose one.
name: Natural Gift

description:
Nature Power becomes a Move according to the current environment:

  • Snowy: Ice Beam
  • Cave: Power Gem
  • Sandy, Rocky: Earth Power
  • Grassy: Energy Ball
  • Watery: Hydro Pump
  • Volcano: Lava Plume
  • Misty: Moonblast
  • Grassy: Energy Ball
  • Electric: Thunderbolt
  • Psychic: Psychic
  • Spacey: Psyshock
  • Other: Tri Attack
zEffect: The used Move turns into its corresponding Z-Move.
name: Nature Power

description: The force of nature halves the target’s current HP.
name: Nature’s Madness

description: Flinches on 15+. Wild swinging of thorny arms.
name: Needle Arm

description: On 13+, Drops Accuracy Rate by -1. A pitch-black shockwave ripples through the target.
name: Night Daze

description: The target loses HP equal to 3× the user’s Level. Don’t apply Weakness or Resistance, but apply Immunities. An apparition frightens the life out of the target.
name: Night Shade

description: Critical Hit on 18+. Gashes the target as soon as their guard wavers.
name: Night Slash

description: If the target is Asleep, scary dreams make them lose 3 Ticks of HP between rounds until they awaken.
name: Nightmare

description: Traps the user and Boosts all Stats by +5 each, unless the user is already Trapped by No Retreat. Fills the user with willpower.
name: No Retreat

description: Sonic. Drops ATK and SATK by -5 each. A war cry that cows foes.
name: Noble Roar

description: Poisons on 16+. A nitrous oxide speed burst accelerates into the target.
name: Noxious Torque

description: Paralyzes the target by rubbing electrified cheeks against it.
name: Nuzzle

description: The user gains HP equal to the Damage Roll. A shrouded wing of death.
name: Oblivion Wing

description: Super-Priority. Protects the user from non-Status Moves and Drops DEF by -6 for attackers who make contact. Blocks obstinately enough to knock off-guard.
name: Obstruct

description: On 11+, Drops Accuracy Rate by -2. A bullet of ink aimed at the eyes.
name: Octazooka

description: Traps the target. The target Drops DEF and SDEF by -5 between Rounds until they leave battle. Wraps a poor sucker up and squeezes.
name: Octolock

description: While the user and target stay in battle, ignore the target’s Evasion Boosts and Normal/Fighting Immunities. Reveals the target via scent tracking.
name: Odor Sleuth

description: On 19+, Boosts all the user’s Stats by +5, even if it misses. A foreboding breeze that sometimes brings ill luck. If there’s only one target, Ominous Wind does +6 damage.
name: Ominous Wind

description: The dinner bell tolls for thee. If the user is being commanded by Tatsugiri, Boost one of their Stats by +5 based on Tatsugiri’s form: Droopy for DEF, Curly for ATK, and Stretchy for SPE.
name: Order Up

description: Brilliant blue lights strike with the pressure of the Abyssal Zone. If there’s only one target, Origin Pulse does +8 damage.
name: Origin Pulse

description: Used for the next 2 turns, then Confuses the user. A tantrum of imperial wrath.
name: Outrage

description: Sonic. Twangs the right strings to ruin the day. If there’s only one target, Overdrive does +5 damage.
name: Overdrive

description: Drops the user’s SATK by -10. Burns the user’s fuel supply faster than it can sustain.
name: Overheat

description: Average the user’s and the target’s HP together. Makes things a little more fair.
name: Pain Split

description: Drains half the total damage dealt. Steals electrons from the surroundings. If there is only one target, Parabolic Charge does +4 damage.
name: Parabolic Charge

description: Sonic. Drops the target’s ATK and SATK by -5 each, then switches out, even if the user is Trapped. Choose the replacement when choosing this Move.Threatens to be back again someday.
name: Parting Shot

description: Scatters coins worth 10× the user’s level if used in battle; the battle’s winner gets to pocket the coins.
name: Pay Day

description: If the target already took their turn this round, Payback does +10 damage.
name: Payback

description: Bonks with a beak, or something like one.
name: Peck

description: Sonic. Bypasses Protection. All Pokémon on the field get a Perish Count of 3. At the start of each target’s turn, their Perish Count lowers by 1. When a Perish Count reaches 0, the Pokémon Faints. Pokémon lose Perish Counts upon leaving battle.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Perish Song

description: A violent storm of flowers lacerates targets. If there is only one target, Petal Blizzard does +6 damage.
name: Petal Blizzard

description: Used for the next 2 turns, then Confuses the user. A boisterous dance that pelts targets with flowers.
name: Petal Dance

description: First turn: The user disappears from the field. Next turn: The user appears next to a target and attacks. Bypasses and removes Protection on hit.
name: Phantom Force

description: Ignores targets’ Abilities while attacking. If the user’s ATK is higher than their SATK, Photon Geyser becomes Physical. A pillar of light erupts beneath the target.
name: Photon Geyser

description: If the user was fed Poffins today, gets +15 damage. Repays the trainer’s friendship in kind.
name: Pika Papow

description: Multi-strike. A barrage of pins like a hornet swarm’s stingers.
name: Pin Missile

description: Hypercharged matter arcs from the user’s claws, changing Normal-Type Moves to Electric for the rest of the round.
name: Plasma Fists

description: Bypasses Protection. Drops ATK by -5. Psychological warfare.
name: Play Nice

description: On 19+, Drops ATK by -5. Frolics wildly with the target and reckless abandon.
name: Play Rough

description: If the target holds a Berry, the user eats it and triggers the Berry’s effect. A bothersome beak bogarts Berries.
name: Pluck

description: Badly Poisons on 11+. Sinks a toxic bite into the target.
name: Poison Fang

description: All targets are Poisoned. A cloud of corrosive toxin sprayed in targets’ faces.
name: Poison Gas

description: Poisons on 15+. A strike steeped in potent poison.
name: Poison Jab

description: The target is Poisoned. Toxic dust inhaled by the unwary. Grass-Types are immune to Poison Powder.
name: Poison Powder

description: Poisons on 17+. Stabs with a small barb.
name: Poison Sting

description: Critical Hit on 18+, Poisons on 19+. Slams the target with a tail leaking toxins.
name: Poison Tail

description: An exploding pollen puff. If the target is an ally, instead heals half Max HP with a fuzzy treat.
name: Pollen Puff

description: Fails if used on a target with no Held Item. Beats a victim with their possessed inventory.
name: Poltergeist

description: The user’s fellows multiply like mice for a incisor-slicing combo. Hits a number of times equal to half of the Attack Roll.
name: Population Bomb

description: Springs onto the target, Dropping SPE by -5.
name: Pounce

description: The most basic strike.
name: Pound

description: Priority. Dusts the target with combustible scales. If the target uses a Fire Move this round, the scales explode, the target loses 3 Ticks, and the Fire Move does nothing. (It still spends PP.) Grass-Types are immune to Powder.
name: Powder

description: Freezes on 19+. A flurry of chilly snow.
name: Powder Snow

description: A ray of light that sparkles like gemstones.
name: Power Gem

description: A deeper power switches the user’s ATK with DEF and their SATK with SDEF until they leave battle.
zEffect: Boost ATK and SATK by +5 each
name: Power Shift

description: A strange power averages the user’s ATK and SATK with the target’s until the end of the battle. Ignore Boosts/Drops.
name: Power Split

description: The user and target trade ATK and SATK Boosts/Drops.
name: Power Swap

description: A deep psychic power switches ATK and DEF until the user leaves battle.
name: Power Trick

description: For every +1 Boost the user has, add +1 to Power Trip’s damage. A boasting, audacious attack.
name: Power Trip

description: Lashes the target with a thick vine or tentacle.
name: Power Whip

description: Boosts the user’s ATK by +5. Practice hardens the user’s fists.
name: Power-Up Punch

description: Sharp stone plates slice through the earth and the target. If there’s only one target, Precipice Blades does +9 damage.
name: Precipice Blades

description: Present’s Power is equal to its Attack Roll. On 16+, the target instead Heals 3 Ticks.
name: Present

description: Exhausting. Shoots lasers split with a prism.
name: Prismatic Laser

description: Super-Priority. Protects the user. A defensive stance.
name: Protect

description: Confuses on 19+. A peculiar ray that’s bad to look at.
name: Psybeam

description: Rends with an ethereal edge. Psyblade gets +8 Power if the user is on Electric Terrain.
name: Psyblade

description: The user’s Boosts/Drops change to match the target’s with the power of self-hypnosis.
name: Psych Up

description: On 17+, Drops SDEF by -5. Psychokinetic force bedevils the target.
name: Psychic

description: Before successfully inflicting damage, destroy the target party’s Reflects, Light Screens, and Aurora Veils. Telekinetic teeth tear the target.
name: Psychic Fangs

description: The field becomes Psychic for 5 rounds. (Characters standing on Psychic Terrain are immune to Priority Moves, and damaging Psychic Moves gain +5 damage.)
name: Psychic Terrain

description: Drops the user’s SATK by -10. A neuron-fraying release of psychic energy.
name: Psycho Boost

description: Critical Hit on 18+. Psychic blades slice into the target.
name: Psycho Cut

description: The user gives one of their Status Problems to the target. Only usable if the target doesn’t already have the transferred Problem.
name: Psycho Shift

description: Boosts the user’s DEF by +5. Cloaks with a psychic barrier and rushes the target.
name: Psyshield Bash

description: The target subtracts DEF from Psyshock’s damage instead of SDEF. A psychic wave lifts debris and clobbers the target with it.
name: Psyshock

description: The target subtracts DEF from Psystrike’s damage instead of SDEF. An odd wave of pure force slams into the target.
name: Psystrike

description:
The target loses HP equal to 2× the user’s Level; ignore Stats and Weakness and Resistance, but not Immunity. Psywave’s Effectiveness changes with each Attack Roll:

  • 1–4: -1 Effectiveness
  • 5–9: no change
  • 10–14: +1 Effectiveness
  • 15–20: +2 Effectiveness
name: Psywave

description: Punishment does +2 damage for every +5 worth of Boosts the target has. Chastises the target for their hubris.
name: Punishment

description: Cures the target of Poison, Paralysis, Burn, Frozen, or Sleep. If it does, heal half the user’s Max HP. Pyukumuku thinks disease is delicious!
zEffect: Boost all the user's Stats by +5 each.
name: Purify

description: If the target flees or switches out this round, Pursuit prevents them from leaving and does +8 damage. Rubs cowardice in the target’s face.
name: Pursuit

description: Burns on 19+. Scores that KO with a flame-wrapped rock.
name: Pyro Ball

description: The target’s SPE becomes 0 for the rest of the round. Aggravates the target into postponing its action.
name: Quash

description: Priority. A tackle of astonishing speed.
name: Quick Attack

description: Super-Priority. Quick Guard protects allies and the user from other Priority Moves this round. Can be used consecutively.
name: Quick Guard

description: Boosts SATK, SDEF, and SPE by +5 each with a beautiful dance like a flitting butterfly.
name: Quiver Dance

description: Until the user’s next turn, Boost the user’s ATK by +5 whenever damaged by a Move, even if Rage misses. Get mad, then get even.
name: Rage

description: Converts anger into punch energy. Each time a Physical or Special Move hits the user, Rage Fist gets +4 Power.
name: Rage Fist

description: Priority. Foes must target the user (if possible) with their Moves for the rest of the round. Grass Types are immune. Scatters a cloud of irritating spores.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Rage Powder

description: Raging Bull’s Type matches the user’s second Type if it has one, otherwise their first Type. Before successfully inflicting damage, destroy the target party’s Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil. A tackle tougher than a bullring barrier.
name: Raging Bull

description: Used for the next 2 turns, then Confuses the user. A vicious flame-spewing rampage.
name: Raging Fury

description: The weather becomes Rainy for 5 rounds. (Water Moves do +10 damage, and Fire Moves have their damage reduced by -10.)
name: Rain Dance

description: Boosts the user’s SPE by +5, destroys all Hazards targeting allies, and removes the user’s Trapped or Leech Seed status. Rotates quickly to throw off hindrances.
name: Rapid Spin

description: Critical Hit on 18+. Sharp leaves scrape targets. If there is only one target, Razor Leaf does +3 damage.
name: Razor Leaf

description: On 11+, Drops DEF by -5. A seashell blade with a serrated edge.
name: Razor Shell

description: This turn: the user whips up a whirlwind. Next turn: blades of wind strike, with a Critical Hit on 18+. If there is only one target, Razor Wind does +5 damage.
name: Razor Wind

description: The user heals half of its max HP. Stimulates cell division.
name: Recover

description: The last item consumed by the user reappears as if they hadn’t consumed it. Waste not, want not!
name: Recycle

description: Physical Moves targeting yourself and affected allies get -1 Effectiveness for 5 rounds. Reflect lasts 1 round less for each ally you choose to target when using it.
name: Reflect

description: Until the end of the battle, change the user’s Types to copy the target’s Types.
name: Reflect Type

description: Cures the user of Poison, Burn, and Paralysis. A breather cures what ails you.
name: Refresh

description:
Sonic. Sleep on 16+. An ancient song of emotions past. If there is only one target, Relic Song does +5 damage.

Meloetta swaps Formes when it uses Relic Song.
name: Relic Song

description: Inflicts Sleep with no saving throw. If the user successfully fell asleep, fully heal their HP and Status Problems. They wake up at the end of their turn in 2 rounds. A psychically-induced power nap.
name: Rest

description: Retaliate does +8 damage if an ally Fainted the previous round. Fueled by indignation for fallen comrades.
name: Retaliate

description: If the user was fed Poffins today, Return does +15 damage. If the user has fainted today, Return has 0 Power. Repays a trainer’s favor in kind.
name: Return

description: Revelation Dance’s Type matches the user’s first Type. Attacks by dancing very hard.
name: Revelation Dance

description: Delayed. If the target damaged the user this round, Revenge does +12 damage.
name: Revenge

description: Does +4 damage for every Tick of HP the user has lost. A power unlocked by imminent peril.
name: Reversal

description: Bestows a loving blessing to revive a Fainted party Pokémon with 50% of its HP.
name: Revival Blessing

description: Does +10 damage to targets standing on Electric Terrain. Pulls the electricty from eons of lightning back out into some poor fool.
name: Rising Voltage

description: Delayed. Sonic. Bypasses Protection. Scares wild targets into fleeing, and trained targets switch out for a random party member.
name: Roar

description: Exhausting. A power that distorts even time.
name: Roar of Time

description: Multi-strike. Rolls a variety of boulders at the target.
name: Rock Blast

description:
Confuses on 17+.

The user can scale cliffs, brick buildings, and other rough vertical surfaces without breaking a sweat.
name: Rock Climb

description: Boosts SPE by +10. Smoothing off edges reduces drag and rolling friction.
name: Rock Polish

description: Flinches on 17+. Clobbers foes with rocks from above. If there is only one target, Rock Slide does +5 damage.
name: Rock Slide

description:
On 17+, Drops DEF by -5.

The user can shatter fragile rocks and weakened structures with one blow.
name: Rock Smash

description: Tosses a small stone.
name: Rock Throw

description: Drops SPE by -5. Surrounds the target with boulders to restrict its movement.
name: Rock Tomb

description: Exhausting. Launches a bus-sized boulder.
name: Rock Wrecker

description: Bypasses Protection. The user gains a random one of the target’s Abilities until the user leaves battle.
name: Role Play

description: Flinches on 15+. A roundhouse kick to the head.
name: Rolling Kick

description: Use Rollout each turn until it hits 5 times or misses once. Each successful hit increases damage by +5 until it ends. Gain momentum like a rolling stone.
name: Rollout

description: The user Heals half of its full HP and loses Flying-Type until their next turn. Flight is tiresome.
name: Roost

description: Bypasses Protection. Boosts in-Zone Grass-Types’ ATK and SATK by +5 each. Tilled soil vitalizes plants.
name: Rototiller

description: Sonic. The first time an ally uses Round this round, all other users take their turn right after with +10 damage. An a capella armada.
name: Round

description: Summons a ruinous disaster to halve the target’s current HP.
name: Ruination

description: Burns on 11+. Razes with an intense, mystical flame.
name: Sacred Fire

description: Ignores DEF and Evasion Boosts. A blade or long horn wielded with expert swordsmanship.
name: Sacred Sword

description: Yourself and affected allies can’t get Status Problems from other characters for 5 rounds. Safeguard lasts 1 round less for each ally (except the user) you choose to target when using it.
name: Safeguard

description: Salt-cures the target to lose 2 Ticks every turn until they switch out. Steel- and Water-Types lose 4 Ticks each turn instead.
name: Salt Cure

description: The target gets -2 Accuracy Rate. Tosses sand in their face.
name: Sand Attack

description: Binds and Traps the target in an excoriating dust devil for 3 rounds, dealing 2 Ticks of HP Loss between rounds.
name: Sand Tomb

description: Burns on 15+. Summons a sirocco of fierce wind and blistering-hot sand.
name: Sandsear Storm

description: The weather becomes Sandstorm for 5 rounds. (All non-Ground, Rock, or Steel-Types lose a Tick of HP between rounds, and Rock-Types get +10 SDEF.)
name: Sandstorm

description: Sets Leech Seed on the target. (Until the target leaves battle, Drains a Tick of HP from them between rounds.) A fast-growing stalk beans the foe.
name: Sappy Seed

description: Burns on 15+. Spouts boiling water at the target.
name: Scald

description: Multi-Strike. Boosts the user’s SPE by +5 and Drops DEF by -5. Violently sheds heavy scales at the target.
name: Scale Shot

description: Drops SPE by -10. Roots the target to the spot with a petrifying expression.
name: Scary Face

description: Burns on 15+. Blasts the target with sun-superheated sand.
name: Scorching Sands

description: Claws rake the target.
name: Scratch

description: Sonic. Drops DEF by -10. An earsplitting screech lowers the target’s guard.
name: Screech

description: Burns on 15+. An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. If there is only one target, Searing Shot does +7 damage.
name: Searing Shot

description: Secret Power’s effect activates on 17+ and depends on the current terrain.
name: Secret Power

description: The target subtracts their DEF from Secret Sword’s damage instead of their SDEF. A dueling strike backed by an odd power.
name: Secret Sword

description: A barrage of hard-shelled seeds detonate from above.
name: Seed Bomb

description: Drops SDEF by -10 on 12+. A pollutant-cleansing shockwave that leaves foliage.
name: Seed Flare

description: The target loses HP equal to 3× the user’s level. Ignore Stats and Weakness and Resistance, but not Immunity. A gravity-fed throw.
name: Seismic Toss

description: The user Faints in a respectable kaboom. If there is only one target, Self-Destruct does +17 damage.
name: Self-Destruct

description: On 17+, Drops SDEF by -5. A blob of gloom and doom.
name: Shadow Ball

description: Critical hit on 18+. A wicked blade of air is formed using a shadowy aura.
name: Shadow Blast

description: A Pokémon throws this tackle while casting a shadowy aura.
name: Shadow Blitz

description: Paralyzes on 18+. A shadowy thunder attack.
name: Shadow Bolt

description: On 17+, Drops DEF by -5. Beats the target with a possessed bone.
name: Shadow Bone

description: A shattering ram attack with a shadowy aura.
name: Shadow Break

description: Freezes on 18+. A shadowy ice attack.
name: Shadow Chill

description: Critical Hit on 18+. Sharpened shadows rake the target.
name: Shadow Claw

description: A shadowy aura Drops foes’ DEF by -10.
name: Shadow Down

description: A shadowy ram attack that cuts the user’s current HP by ½ if it hits.
name: Shadow End

description: Burns on 18+. A shadowy fireball attack.
name: Shadow Fire

description: First turn: The user disappears. Next turn: The user appears next to a target and attacks. Bypasses and removes Protection on hit.
name: Shadow Force

description: Exhausting. A shadowy aura’s energy cuts targets’ current HP in ½.
zEffect: Boost the user’s DEF and SDEF by +10 each.
name: Shadow Half

description: Traps targets with a shadowy aura as long as the user remains in battle.
zEffect: Boost the user's Accuracy Rate by +2.
name: Shadow Hold

description: A shadowy aura sharply cuts foes’ evasiveness.
zEffect: Boost the user's Critical Rate by +2.
name: Shadow Mist

description: Sonic. A shadowy aura emanates to Confuse targets.
name: Shadow Panic

description: A punch from the shadows to wallop an unsuspecting target.
name: Shadow Punch

description: A shadowy aura in the ground launches spikes through foes. If there is only one target, gets +16 Power.
name: Shadow Rave
