description: Recoil 1 Tick. Ignores Type; always 1× Effectiveness. Enters Hyper Mode instead of attacking on a roll of 13+. If in Hyper Mode, critical hit on 3+.
name: Shadow Rush

description: A shadowy aura eliminates Reflect, Light Screen, Safe Guard, and Aurora Veil.
zEffect: Boost all the user's Stats by +5 each.
name: Shadow Shed

description: Bursts of light rain from shadowy aura clouds, hurting all but Shadow Pokémon for 5 turns for 1 tick between Rounds. Damaging Shadow Moves get +10 damage, and Weather Ball is powered up and becomes Typeless.
name: Shadow Sky

description: Priority. The user’s shadow looms behind the target and smacks it.
name: Shadow Sneak

description: A shadowy aura whips up a vicious tornado.
name: Shadow Storm

description: Shadowy aura waves are loosed to inflict damage. If there is only one target, gets +8 Power.
name: Shadow Wave

description: Boosts ATK by +5. Steepens angles to get spikier.
name: Sharpen

description: The user puts 3 Ticks of their HP into a severed tail; if they don’t have that much HP to give, Shed Tail fails. They then switch out and the tail protects the switched-in combatant like the Move Substitute would.
name: Shed Tail

description: Add the user’s level and subtract the target’s level from the attack roll. Ignore Evasion and Accuracy Rate. Faints the target by absolute zero exposure. Accuracy is 17 if used by a non Ice-Type, fails on Ice-Type targets.
name: Sheer Cold

description: Poisons on 17+. Becomes a Contact Physical Move if it would do more damage (SATK − SDEF vs. ATK − DEF). A venom blaster that doubles as a club.
name: Shell Side Arm

description: Shatters armor to Boost ATK, SATK, and SPE by +10 each, and Drop DEF and SDEF by -5 each.
name: Shell Smash

description: Super-Priority. The trap immediately triggers the first time the user survives a Physical Move this round. Otherwise, the trap fails. If there is only one target, Shell Trap does +12 damage.
name: Shell Trap

description: Hardens the user’s skin like iron to Boost DEF by +10 and Evasion by +2.
name: Shelter

description: Boosts SPE by +10 and ATK by +5 from shifting into maximum overdrive.
name: Shift Gear

description: A jolt of electricity so fast it can’t be avoided.
name: Shock Wave

description: Gathers sand to Heal ½ Max HP. Heals 3 more Ticks in a Sandstorm.
name: Shore Up

description: Confuses on 19+. A rapidly-flashing beam of insect communication.
name: Signal Beam

description: Super-Priority. Protects the user. If the prevented Move made Contact, Drop the attacker’s SPE by -5. Spun silk tangles would-be attackers.
name: Silk Trap

description: On 19+, Boosts all the user’s Stats by +5, even if it misses. A gross breeze that sometimes brings bug triumph.
name: Silver Wind

description: Change the target’s Ability of your choice to Simple until the target leaves battle. A brainwashing attack.
name: Simple Beam

description: Sonic. The target falls Asleep. A soothing lullaby in a calming voice.
name: Sing

description: Burns the target with a searing charge.
name: Sizzly Slide

description: Permanently replace Sketch with the last Move the target used.
zEffect: Boost all the user's Stats by +5 each.
name: Sketch

description: The user swaps an Ability of their choice with a random Ability from the target. Either regains their original Ability upon leaving battle.
name: Skill Swap

description: Drops the target’s SATK by -5. Weaponizes the user’s creepy and/or crawly nature to unnervingly approach with a creeping strike.
name: Skitter Smack

description: This turn: The user tucks in their head, Boosting DEF by +5. Next turn: The user attacks with a rocket headbutt.
name: Skull Bash

description: This turn: The user ascends. Next turn: Pierces from the sky. Flinches on 17+, is a Critical Hit on 18+.
name: Sky Attack

description:
This turn: If Sky Drop successfully hits, the user carries the target into the air. The target cannot act until Sky Drop finishes.
Next turn: The user plummets the target into the ground, dealing Sky Drop’s damage. Does no damage to Flying-Types or targets with Levitate.
name: Sky Drop

description: Can hit high-flying targets, like those using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. A rising uppercut driven high into the air.
name: Sky Uppercut

description: The user Heals half of their max HP by taking a quick breather.
name: Slack Off

description: An improved strike with leverage.
name: Slam

description: Critical Hit on 18+. A sundering slice with sharp edges.
name: Slash

description: The target falls Asleep. Soporific dust inhaled by the unwary. Grass-Types are immune to Sleep Powder.
name: Sleep Powder

description: If the user is asleep: choose 2 of the user’s Moves, then use a DC10 roll to see which one to use despite being Asleep.
zEffect: Boost the user's Critical Rate by +2, then the used Move turns into its corresponding Z-Move.
name: Sleep Talk

description: Poisons on 15+. Unsanitary goop douses the target.
name: Sludge

description: Poisons on 15+. Explodes into a serious health hazard.
name: Sludge Bomb

description: Poisons on 19+. Swamps the Zone with a poisonous tide. If there is only one target, Sludge Wave does +7 damage.
name: Sludge Wave

description: The target falls to the earth and loses Ground Immunity until its next turn. Can hit users of Fly, Bounce, and Sky Drop during the first turn, canceling the second turn. Knocks ‘em right outta the sky.
name: Smack Down

description: Magnetizes the user’s horn(s) to seek the target.
name: Smart Strike

description: If the target is Paralyzed, Smelling Salts does +8 damage and cures the target of Paralysis. Violently restores feeling to cramped muscles.
name: Smelling Salts

description: Poisons on 12+. Discharges foul gases.
name: Smog

description: Drops Accuracy Rate by -2 with an inky cloud that obscures the target’s vision.
name: Smokescreen

description: Binds and Traps the target for 3 rounds, dealing 2 Ticks of HP Loss between rounds. Snares anything that moves.
name: Snap Trap

description: Sonic. Drops SATK by -5. An angry, ranting shout. If there is only one target, Snarl does +3 damage.
name: Snarl

description: Super-Priority. If the target uses a Self-Targeting Move this round, you gain the that Move’s benefits instead of the target. Thievery that knows no bounds.
name: Snatch

description: Ignores Abilities and Moves that would change its target. A perfect bullseye that accounts for everything.
name: Snipe Shot

description: Sonic. Flinches on 15+. Only usable when Asleep.
name: Snore

description: Summons a snowstorm for 5 rounds. (All Ice-Types get +10 DEF.)
name: Snowscape

description: The target becomes Water-Type from a thorough drenching. (Resist Fire/Ice/Steel/Water, weak to Electric/Grass.)
name: Soak

description: The user Heals half its max HP. Eggs are good for you.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Soft-Boiled

description: This turn: the user gathers sunlight. Next turn: fires an energy beam. In Harsh Sunlight, attacks on the first turn. In rain, gets -10 damage.
name: Solar Beam

description: This turn: the user gathers sunlight. Next turn: looses an energy sword. In Harsh Sunlight, attacks on the first turn. In rain, gets -10 damage.
name: Solar Blade

description: Sonic. A steady shockwave makes the target lose 15 HP. (Ignore Stats and Weakness and Resistance, but not Immunity.)
name: Sonic Boom

description: Critical Hit on 18+. Rips the fabric of spacetime and also the target.
name: Spacial Rend

description: Paralyzes on 15+. A tackle crackling with static electricity.
name: Spark

description: Sonic. Cures targets of Burn. Bursts into song with many bubbles. If there is only one target, Sparkling Aria does +6 damage.
name: Sparkling Aria

description: A cyclone of scent overpowers the target and cures all Status Problem for allies and the user’s party.
name: Sparkly Swirl

description: Hides in the target’s shadow to steal its Boosts, then attacks. Bypasses Substitute.
name: Spectral Thief

description: An odd power exchanges SPE with the target.
name: Speed Swap

description: Emits pure capsaicin to Boost ATK by +10 and Drop DEF by -10.
name: Spicy Extract

description: Bypasses Protection. The target is Trapped while the user stays in battle. A snare of sticky silk.
name: Spider Web

description: Multi-strike. Marine thorns torpedo the target.
name: Spike Cannon

description: Hazard. Foes that enter the Zone lose a Tick of HP for each time Spikes was used in the Zone.
name: Spikes

description: Super-Priority. Thorny armor protects the user until the next round. Moves that make contact cause the attacker to lose 2 Ticks.
name: Spiky Shield

description: Strains legs to spin furiously, Dropping the user’s SPE by -10.
name: Spin Out

description: Drops the target’s SATK by -5. An ogrish blow hits so hard nobody wants to continue.
name: Spirit Break

description: Stitches the target’s shadow to the ground, Trapping it.
name: Spirit Shackle

description:
For each Stockpile the user has, Spit Up does +10 damage.
Afterward, the user’s Stockpiles are set to 0.
name: Spit Up

description: The last Move the target used has its PP cost doubled.
name: Spite

description: The user hops around pathetically.
name: Splash

description: Paralyzes on 15+. An electric wave washing over the front.
name: Splishy Splash

description: The target falls Asleep, unless it’s Grass-Type. Mushroom dust causes certain slumber.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Spore

description: Super-Priority. Shines a spotlight to attract the target’s foes’ attacks this round.
name: Spotlight

description: On 15+, Drops that target’s ATK by -5. Summons a tempest brimming with love and hate. If there is only one target, Springtide Storm gains +7 Power.
name: Springtide Storm

description: Hazard. Foes entering battle lose 2 Ticks of HP. (Apply Weakness/Resistance, but not stats.)
name: Stealth Rock

description: Burns on 15+. Douses the target with superheated steam.
name: Steam Eruption

description: Flinches on 15+. Curls up and flattens the target.
name: Steamroller

description: The user loses 50% of their HP. (This isn’t Recoil.) Fires built-up metal in a single shot.
name: Steel Beam

description: Destroys all Terrain in the user’s Zone; fails if used without Terrain. Wrecks the field, then wrecks with the field.
name: Steel Roller

description: On 15+, Boosts the user’s DEF by +5, even if Steel Wing misses. Stiff wings clatter against the target.
name: Steel Wing

description: Hazard. Foes that enter the Zone have their SPE Drop by -5.
name: Sticky Web

description: The user gains 1 Stockpile, to a maximum of 3. Each Stockpile Boosts DEF and SDEF by +5 each. You don’t want to know how this works.
name: Stockpile

description: Hot blooded enthusiasm suddenly fuels the user, Boosting SATK and SPE by +5 each.
name: Stoke

description: Flinches on 15+. Brings a big foot down on the target.
name: Stomp

description: If the user’s previous Move failed, missed, was stopped by a status problem, or had no effect on its target(s), Stomping Tantrum gets +10 Power. (No buff if the targets Protected themselves.)
name: Stomping Tantrum

description: Critical Hit on 18+. Swings axes that splinter into a Stealth Rock hazard.
name: Stone Axe

description: Critical Hit on 17+. Stabs the target with rock-hard points.
name: Stone Edge

description: For every +1 Boost the user has, add +1 to Stored Power’s damage.
name: Stored Power

description: Always a Critical Hit. A throw that has trounced foes for centuries.
name: Storm Throw

description: Confuses on 17+. A scalding relaxing steam makes foes forget their reason to fight.
name: Strange Steam

description: Shines a crystal trick on unsuspecting opponents.
name: Stratagem

description: The user can heave objects tirelessly. Doubles as a fierce slugging.
name: Strength

description: Saps vitality, Healing the user by the amount of the target’s ATK. Then the target’s ATK Drops by -5.
name: Strength Sap

description: Fires sticky silk thread to Drop the SPE of targets by -10.
name: String Shot

description: Ignores Effectiveness, and the user loses 3 Ticks of HP. Better than nothing.
name: Struggle

description: Drops SATK by -5. Weaponizes the inherent grossness of insects.
name: Struggle Bug

description: If the user holds a Berry, they eat it and Boost their DEF by +10, even if an effect prevents them from eating normally. If it’s time to eat, it’s time.
name: Stuff Cheeks

description: The target is Paralyzed. Grass-Types are immune to Stun Spore. Numbing dust inhaled by the unwary.
name: Stun Spore

description: Recoil ¼. A dangerous but flashy technique.
name: Submission

description: The user puts 3 Ticks of their HP into a substitute; if they don’t have that much HP to give, Substitute fails. The substitute is targeted instead of the user as long as it has HP, has the user’s Types and Stats, is immune to Status Problems and Status Moves, but is bypassed by Sonic Moves. Excess damage from Multi-Strike Moves carry over to the user.
name: Substitute

description: Priority. If the target didn’t choose a damaging Move this round, Sucker Punch fails. If they’re coming for you, you know where they’re going.
name: Sucker Punch

description: The weather becomes Harsh Sunlight for 5 rounds. (Fire Moves do +10 damage, and Water Moves have their damage reduced by -10.)
name: Sunny Day

description: A meteor-impact tacke that ignores targets’ Abilities while attacking.
name: Sunsteel Strike

description: The target loses ½ of its current HP from sharp incisors that can bisect anything.
name: Super Fang

description: Drops the user’s ATK and DEF by -5 each. A strength that seems to come with dullness.
name: Superpower

description: Sonic. The target is Confused. An inaudible pitch messes with the inner ear.
name: Supersonic

description:
Soaks the Zone with a swell of water. If there is only one target, Surf gains +12 Power.

The user can swim across the water’s surface without tiring.
name: Surf

description: Always a Critical Hit. Hits 3 times. Only add STAB and ATK for the first hit, and the target only subracts DEF for the first hit. A neverending waterfall of hits.
name: Surging Strikes

description: Confuses the target, and Boosts their ATK by +10. They want to teach you a lesson real bad.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Swagger

description:
The user heals damage according to its Stockpile count.
0: Nothing.
1: Heals ¼ of its full HP
2: Heals ½ of its full HP
3: Heals to full HP
Afterward, the user’s Stockpiles are set to 0.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Swallow

description: The target is Confused by an innocent show of affection.
name: Sweet Kiss

description:
An intriguing smell Drops Evasion by -2.

Can also be used outside of battle like the Honey Item.
zEffect: Boost the user's Accuracy Rate by +2.
name: Sweet Scent

description: Star-shaped rays pummel foes faster than they can react. If there is only one target, Swift does +3 damage.
name: Swift

description: The user and the target exchange held items. Thanks, pal!
name: Switcheroo

description: Boosts ATK by +10. A frenetic dance that heightens aggression.
name: Swords Dance

description: A strong wave that only damages targets that share any Type with the user. If there is only one target damaged, Synchronoise does +10 damage.
name: Synchronoise

description:
Synthesis heals different amounts depending on the Weather:

Clear weather: 5 Ticks
Harsh Sunlight: 8 Ticks
Other: 3 Ticks
name: Synthesis

description: An unskilled charging attack.
name: Tackle

description: Boosts SATK by +15. The user’s butt blinks like a firefly’s.
zEffect: Remove any Stat Drops on the user.
name: Tail Glow

description: Multi-strike. The user’s tail sweeps up the ground and the opponent.
name: Tail Slap

description: Drops DEF by -5. A friendly wagging tail drops a lot of guards.
name: Tail Whip

description: For 4 rounds, double your party’s SPE. (Tailwind doesn’t stack.)
zEffect: Boost the user's Critical Rate by +2.
name: Tailwind

description: Recoil ¼. A dangerous full-body charge.
name: Take Down

description: Boosts SATK and SDEF by +5 each, and cures Poison, Burn, and Paralysis. Lifts spirits with a brave impulse.
name: Take Heart

description: Drops SPE by -10 and gives +1 Effectiveness to incoming Fire damage with a dollop of sticky tar.
name: Tar Shot

description: An enraging jeer stops the target from using Status Moves for their next 3 rounds.
name: Taunt

description: Bypasses Protection. Drops ATK and SATK by -5. Teary eyes lower the target’s aggression.
name: Tearful Look

description: Bypasses Protection. All characters eat one of their held Berries, even if an effect prevents them from eating normally. An invitation nobody’s rude enough to decline.
name: Teatime

description: Techno Blast’s Type matches a held Drive. A laser of unknown properties.
name: Techno Blast

description: Confuses the targets. A wobbly dance that makes you dizzy just watching it.
name: Teeter Dance

description: For 3 rounds, the target gains the Levitate Ability and all Moves targeting them (except for OHKO Moves) Can’t Miss. Hoists the target aloft with psychokinesis.
name: Telekinesis

description: Delayed. The user flees or switches out, and foes can’t make a SPE check to chase them. Choose the replacement on your Pokémon’s turn.
name: Teleport

description: If the user has Terastallized, Tera Blast’s Type matches their Type and becomes Physical or Special depending on the higher of the user’s ATK or SATK.
name: Tera Blast

description:
If the user stands on a special Terrain, does +10 damage and changes Type:
• Electric Terrain: Electric-Type
• Grassy Terrain: Grass-Type
• Misty Terrain: Fairy-Type
• Psychic Terrain: Psychic-Type
name: Terrain Pulse

description: Steals the target’s held item if the user can hold it. A despicable mugging.
name: Thief

description: Ignores Ground Immunity, and damaged targets fall to the earth. Zygarde’s cells launch into the sky. If there is only one target, Thousand Arrows does +6 damage.
name: Thousand Arrows

description: Damaged targets are Trapped. Zygarde’s cells overwhelm foes along the ground. If there is only one target, Thousand Waves does +6 damage.
name: Thousand Waves

description: Used for the next 2 turns, then Confuses the user. A wild flurry of blows.
name: Thrash

description: The target can’t use any Sonic Moves for their next 2 turns. Attacks the windpipe with a sharp thrust.
name: Throat Chop

description: Paralyzes on 15+. If Sunny, Accuracy Check is 16. If Rainy, can’t miss. Hits high-flying targets, like those using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. A towering lightning bolt.
name: Thunder

description: Binds and Traps the target for 3 rounds with an electric prison, dealing 2 Ticks of HP Loss between rounds.
name: Thunder Cage

description: Paralyzes on 18, Flinches on 19. On 20, Paralyzes and Flinches. Chomps while breathing electricity.
name: Thunder Fang

description: Paralyzes on 19+. A high-voltage fist.
name: Thunder Punch

description: Paralyzes on 17+. A minor jolt of electricity.
name: Thunder Shock

description: Paralyzes the target, unless they’re immune to Electric. Disrupts the target’s muscles.
name: Thunder Wave

description: Paralyzes on 19+. A 100,000-Volt shock.
name: Thunderbolt

description: Drops DEF by -5. A kick so lightning kick there’s not even a chance to defend.
name: Thunderous Kick

description: Drops ATK and DEF by -5 each. It’s hard to fight while laughing.
name: Tickle

description: Cleans up Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Substitute for both allies and foes, then Boosts the user’s ATK and SPE by +5 each.
zEffect: Boost the user's Accuracy Rate by +2.
name: Tidy Up

description: Invert the target’s Boosts and Drops. (+1 becomes -1, -5 becomes +5, etc. Doesn’t count as a Boost/Drop for other Moves and Abilities.)
name: Topsy-Turvy

description: Sonic. Blows raging flames as if singing, Boosting the user’s SATK by +5.
name: Torch Song

description: Accusing them of stale moves, the target can’t choose the same Move twice in a row until it leaves battle. (Moves like Rollout or Thrash repeat as usual. If targets have no valid choices, they Struggle.)
name: Torment

description: The target is Badly Poisoned. If the user is Poison-Type, Toxic can’t miss. An ancient, deadly technique.
name: Toxic

description: Hazard. Grounded foes that enter the Zone become Poisoned. If Toxic Spikes was used twice on the same Zone, Badly Poison instead. Grounded Poison-Type foes destroy the spikes when they touch them.
name: Toxic Spikes

description: Poisons the target and Drops their SPE by -5. Venomous spiderwebbing.
name: Toxic Thread

description: Attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass with nimble footwork that Boosts the user’s SPE by +5.
name: Trailblaze

description: The user copies a combatant in Zone of their choice for the rest of the battle: copy Types, Moves, Starting Ability, Skills, Stats, Boosts, and Drops, but not the Level 5 Ability, HP, or PP.
name: Transform

description: On 18+, roll d3: the target becomes 1) Paralyzed, 2) Burnt, or 3) Frozen. A 3-pronged assault.
name: Tri Attack

description: Switch the target’s Held Item with the user’s Held Item. If either doesn’t have one, they still get the other’s item.
name: Trick

description: Delayed. For 5 rounds, turn order is reversed: characters instead go from lowest SPE to highest.
zEffect: Boost the user's Accuracy Rate by +2.
name: Trick Room

description: The target becomes Ghost-Type in addition to its other Types for 5 rounds. Everyone likes a good scare on Halloween. (Resists Bug/Poison, weak to Ghost/Dark, immune to Normal/Fighting and Trapped.)
zEffect: Boost all the user's Stats by +5 each.
name: Trick-or-Treat

description: Flinches on 17+. Boosts user’s Critical Rate by +3 (does not stack). Drops the target’s DEF by -5. An crescent kick followed by three arrows.
name: Triple Arrows

description:
Makes 3 attacks. Only add STAB and ATK to the first hit, and the target only subracts DEF for the first hit.

  1. Power 8
  2. Power 12
  3. Power 16
name: Triple Axel

description: Hits 3 times. A perfectly-timed triple plunge splashes the target.
name: Triple Dive

description:
Makes 3 attacks. Only add STAB and ATK to the first hit, and the target only subracts DEF for the first hit.

  1. Power 4
  2. Power 8
  3. Power 12
name: Triple Kick

description: Drops ATK by -5. An intense kick like a falling coconut.
name: Trop Kick

description: Trump Card does +2 damage for each 1 PP the user has spent since the battle started.
name: Trump Card

description: Double Strike. Shoots mystical beams from the eyes.
name: Twin Beam

description: Double Strike. Poisons on 13+. A one-two combo of venomous stingers.
name: Twineedle

description: Flinches on 18+. Can hit high-flying targets (usually foes using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop) with +10 damage. A dervish that moves like an angry wyrm.
name: Twister

description: If this move deals damage, the user then switches out, even if Trapped. A momentum-shifting aerial somersault like a darting dragonfly.
name: U-Turn

description: Sonic. Used for the next 2 turns. Characters in Zone can’t sleep during Uproar, even if it misses. An insufferable racket.
name: Uproar

description: Drops the user’s DEF, SDEF, and SPE by -5 each. With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at the target.
name: V-Create

description: Priority. The user whirls their arms, firing a low-pressure wave.
name: Vacuum Wave

description: If the user was fed Poffins today, gets +15 damage. Repays the trainer’s friendship in kind.
name: Veevee Volley

description: Drops ATK, SATK, and SPE of Poisoned targets by -5 each. Douses targets in a poison-reactive substance.
name: Venom Drench

description: If the target is Poisoned, Venoshock gets +7 extra damage. A liquid that turns corrosive when combined with toxins.
name: Venoshock

description: Boosts ATK by +10 and DEF by +5. A dance to usher triumph.
name: Victory Dance

description: Slender vines lash the target.
name: Vine Whip

description: Pincers grip and squeeze the target.
name: Vise Grip

description: Delayed. Waits for the foe’s move in order to strike true.
name: Vital Throw

description: If this move deals damage, the user then switches out, even if Trapped. Magnetic repulsion blasts the target and the user backwards.
name: Volt Switch

description: Recoil ⅓. Paralyzes on 19+. Bounces around recklessly inside a ball of electricity.
name: Volt Tackle

description: If the target is Asleep, Wake-Up Slap does +8 damage and the target wakes up. The rudest awakening.
name: Wake-Up Slap

description: Pelts the target with a stream of water.
name: Water Gun

description:
If an ally orders a different Pledge Move before Water Pledge, instead Water Pledge attacks, does +10 damage, and for 4 rounds has an effect depending on the other Pledge:

  • Fire Pledge: A rainbow doubles in-Zone party’s Effect Rates.
  • Grass Pledge: A swamp quarters in-Zone foes’ SPE.
name: Water Pledge

description: Confuses on 17+. Ultrasonic reverberations through a ripple shockwave.
name: Water Pulse

description: Multi-strike. Priority. Rapidly tosses throwing stars made of spit.
name: Water Shuriken

description: Characters in the Zone Resist Fire an extra step for 5 rounds. Splashes water on everything nearby.
name: Water Sport

description: For each Tick of HP the user has lost, Water Spout’s damage is reduced by -1. A furious exhalation of water. If there is only one target, Water Spout gets +12 extra damage.
name: Water Spout

description:
Flinches on 17+. A swimming stroke with the power of rapids.

The user can scale waterfalls without breaking a sweat.
name: Waterfall

description: Recoil ⅓. Surges into the target, scouring both combatants.
name: Wave Crash

description:
In weather, does +15 damage and changes Type:

  • Harsh Sun: Fire-Type
  • Rain: Water-Type
  • Snowstorm: Ice-Type
  • Sandstorm: Rock-Type
name: Weather Ball

description:
Binds and Traps the target for 3 rounds in a swirling whirlpool, dealing 2 Ticks of HP Loss between rounds.

The user can navigate dangerous currents and tricky flows with ease.
name: Whirlpool

description: Bypasses Protection. Delayed. Blows lower-level wild targets out of the fight, and forces trained targets into switching with a random party member.
name: Whirlwind

description: Always a Critical Hit. A single punch that goes right for the heart.
name: Wicked Blow

description: Puts to Sleep on 19+. An axle of evil accelerates into the target.
name: Wicked Torque

description: Super-Priority. Protects the user and their allies from Moves that target more than one of them. Can be used in consecutive rounds.
name: Wide Guard

description: Recoil ¼. The user shrouds themselves in electricity and smashes into the target.
name: Wild Charge

description: Paralyzes on 15+. Summons a thundering supercell of lightning and wind.
name: Wildbolt Storm

description: Burns the target with a dancing mote of flame.
name: Will-O-Wisp

description: Swats the target with a wing. You knew that.
name: Wing Attack

description: At the end of the user’s next turn, the target heals half the user’s max HP. If the user switches out next turn, the replacement becomes the new target.
name: Wish

description: Boosts DEF by +5. The user hides in their tough shell.
name: Withdraw

description: For the next 5 rounds, each character switches their base DEF with their base SDEF. (Boosts/Drops remain where they were.)
name: Wonder Room

description: Recoil ⅓. Slams the target like falling timber.
name: Wood Hammer

description: A rousing cheer fills the user with fight energy, Boosting ATK and SATK by +5 each.
name: Work Up

description: Replaces a random Ability with Insomnia. Now they’ll get to the root of the problem.
name: Worry Seed

description: Binds and Traps the target for 3 rounds with a long body, vines, tentacles, or similar, dealing 2 Ticks of HP Loss between rounds.
name: Wrap

description: For every Tick the target has lost, Wring Out reduces by -2 Power. Hurts less if you go limp.
name: Wring Out

description: A savage swipe that could end a mantis marriage.
name: X-Scissor

description: A contagious yawn makes the target fall Asleep at the end of its next turn.
name: Yawn

description: Paralyzes the target. An electromagnetic blast that can barely be aimed.
name: Zap Cannon

description: Flinches on 15+. Violent thoughts make headbutts hurt harder.
name: Zen Headbutt

description: Flinches on 14+. A prickly electric blast crashes down on the target.
name: Zing Zap

description: Priority. Always a Critical Hit. A jolt so shockingly prickly it’s indescribable.
name: Zippy Zap
